title: Keen 4 control problem
content: I'm having problems with entering the villages.  I know the control key should allow me to enter the village but it's not.  I've tried other keys and haven't found on that works.  I was hoping someone here could help me figure out what is wrong.

title: Re: Keen 4 control problem
content: Are you running the game through plain Windows XP or Dosbox?

title: hmm.
content:
First, double-check your controls in the Options menu. The copy you downloaded might have had the default controls changed.

Second, double-check that you're not holding down any arrow keys while you try and enter--some newer keyboards don't allow more than 2 keys to be pressed at once.

title: Re: hmm.
content:
a+2+Enter

Followed by F10+W

Followed by 1 [or 2]

title: Re: keen4 control problems
content:
the kkey commands for keen 4-6 are as follows

arrows: movement
control: jump
alt: pogo on/off press control while pogoing to jump higher
space bar: fire shots and enter levels
enter: show status panel

note: 2 button firing should be turned off

hope this helps

title: Re: keen4 control problems
content:
Well, if you can't get into the levels, I repeat my advice above, just cheat and warp into them, then when you finnish the level, it'll be done on the map.

title: Re: keen4 control problems
content: I'm running it through DOSBox.  I had to use the warp to get into a level but then once I got into the level Keen wouldn't do any jumping or firing.  I could only run around.

title: Re: keen4 control problems
content: Try to delete your CONFIG.CK4 file, as it will reset your controls to the defaults.

title: Re: keen4 control problems
content:
Hmmm, maybe your settings got scrambled, that happens to me on Keen 1 sometimes, didn't know it'd happen on K4.
